overview:
Caroline Fielding is founder of Dryven, Inc. and the creator of iPhone apps. She began her company in January, 2012 and her first app, Bus Rage, went live on the App Store in October, 2012.

In high school, Caroline always dreamed of running a company. In 2012, her dream became a reality, all the while holding a full time job and raising two teenage sons. Penny pinching, budgeting, strategizing and a whole lot of faith provided the background for the start up of her company, Dryven, Inc. Dryven happens to be a combination of the names of the three grandsons in the family.
